name: Backpack, Large
effects: Wearer adds +10xSTR to maximum Carry weight

name: Backpack, Small
effects: Wearer adds +5xSTR to maximum Carry weight

name: Bobby Pin
effects: Reduces difficulty of Lockpick tests by 1 (minimum 1), One bobby pin breaks per complication rolled

name: Deluxe Toolkit
effects: Reduce the difficulty of Repair tests by 1 (minimum 0), May attempt Repair tests which normally require a workbench or similar at +1 difficulty

name: Doctor’s Bag
effects: Reduce the difficulty of Medicine tests by 1 (minimum 0), When providing long-term care, allows care of up to 2 additional patients

name: Electronic Lockpicker
effects: Reduces difficulty of Lockpick tests by 2 (minimum 0), Ignores first complication rolled, Breaks if two or more complications are rolled at once

name: First Aid Kit
effects: Heal +2 HP upon succeeding at the First Aid action

name: Flashlight
effects: Generates bright light in a single zone within Medium range; the user may choose which zone is illuminated

name: Geiger Counter
effects: Allows a PER + Survival test, difficulty 1, to determine if there is radiation present in an area, and how much

name: Lantern
effects: Generates bright light within Close range, and dim light within Medium range

name: Lock Pick Set
effects: Reduces difficulty of Lockpick tests by 1 (minimum 0), After 3 complications, the set is broken

name: Multi-Tool
effects: Reduce the difficulty of Repair tests by 1 (minimum 0)

name: Pack Brahmin
effects: A mutant cow that carries heavy loads and produces milk and fertilizer. The brahmin can also be milked once a day, requiring an AGI + Survival test with a difficulty of 1. Success means the brahmin produces one brahmin milk (p.161), plus one extra for each AP spent (maximum 5 brahmin milk). A brahmin also produces 2CD  units of fertilizer each day

name: Pip-Boy
effects: Not all Pip-Boys contain the same functions, but the common functions are: ♦ A personal status indicator allows the wearer to see a report on their current health and wellbeing and any medical problems currently afflicting them. ♦ The device maintains an ongoing log of the wearer’s activities, journey, and condition, and place for personal recordings to be made in either text or audio forms. ♦ An inbuilt holotape reader allows the device to accept compact holotapes, able to read and playback audio, video, data, and even games. ♦ It also functions as a compass, a radio, and a Geiger counter, and can generate light from its screen equivalent to a flashlight. In addition, a character equipped with a Pip-Boy may use V.A.T.S. when they make an attack, ignoring the normal difficulty increase for targeting a specific location on the enemy.

name: Radio
effects: Picks up and plays radio transmissions

name: Signal Flare
effects: Generates bright light within close range until the end of the current scene, One use only

name: Torch
effects: Generates bright light within close range until the end of the current scene, Requires an INT + Survival test to light, difficulty 1, +1 for each previous use
